physicalTable.name: SAMP_REVENUE_CURR_F
physicalTable.description: Reveue Currency Fact table: Stores the converted fact information in different currencies.

physicalColumns.name: Revenue_Aud
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue converted to Australian Dollars as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Empl_Key
physicalColumns.description: Employee Key: Joins to Empl_Key of Employees dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Prod_Key
physicalColumns.description: Product Key: Joins to Prod_Key of Products dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Day_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Bill Day Date: Joins to Calendar_date of Time dimension table (Day grain).

physicalColumns.name: Revenue
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue information as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Office_Key
physicalColumns.description: Office Key: Joins to Office_Key of Employees dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Currency
physicalColumns.description: Currency: Stores currency information like AUD, USD, EUR..

physicalColumns.name: Cust_Key
physicalColumns.description: Customer Key: Joins to Cust_Key of Customers dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Mth_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Month Key: Joins to Mth_Key of Time dimension table (Mth grain).

physicalColumns.name: Revenue_Usd
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue converted to US Dollars as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Qtr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Quarter Key: Joins to Qtr_Key of Time dimension table (Qtr grain).

physicalColumns.name: Order_Key
physicalColumns.description: Order Number: Uniquely identifies each record in the fact table.

physicalColumns.name: Revenue_Eur
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue converted to Euros as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Shipto_Addr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Shipto Address Key: Joins to Address_Key column of Addresses dimension table.
